1.新增表
create table hrm_position
(
  id          varchar(50)  not null
  comment '主键'
    primary key,
  name        varchar(100) null
  comment '岗位名称',
  type        varchar(50)  null
  comment '类型',
  mark        varchar(100) null
  comment '备注',
  dr          char         null,
  create_by   varchar(50)  null,
  update_by   varchar(50)  null,
  create_time datetime     null,
  update_time datetime     null
);

-- auto-generated definition
create table hrm_position_type
(
  id          varchar(50)  not null
  comment '主键'
    primary key,
  name        varchar(100) null
  comment '名称',
  mark        varchar(100) null
  comment '备注',
  dr          char         null,
  create_by   varchar(50)  null,
  update_by   varchar(50)  null,
  create_time datetime     null,
  update_time datetime     null
);



INSERT INTO `dt`.`sys_dict` (`dict_id`, `name`, `dict_level`, `status`, `dr`, `mark`, `create_time`, `create_by`, `update_time`, `update_by`) VALUES ('zcdoctype', '资产_文档类型', 'system', 'Y', '0', 'NULL', 'NULL', 'NULL', 'NULL', 'NULL')
